title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Multicultural Understanding and Digital Game-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply digital game-based learning design principles to create multicultural education content.
Learners can identify cultural biases in the game design process and propose at least three strategies for improvement.
Learners can complete a game prototype applicable to real educational settings through project-based collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
